item.description:
It's going to be an awesome night to fly... Let's go to Parlin for some Mexican Yum Yum.... Eat the beans and fly back!

Parlin is only 54 nm and a awesome flight... The sunset is after 8:30. We'll have plenty of time for a nice sunset back.....


http://www.airnav.com...

Remember to order your Shirley Temple Margerita's.. Everyone should make this one..
Not looking promising for Friday's trip to NYC....

Remember rule #1, ALWAY'S CHECK YOUR EMAIL BEFORE BED ON A TUESDAY NIGHT! :-)

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: MMMMMMMexican at Parlin
